transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Aap pehle apna call uthaya hoga na to meeting leave ho gayi thi.
Customer: Ha ha overall sir for India mart hai ye reason sir jo aur improvement la sakta hai wo beta enter to hata diya hai to necessary to nahi dikhayega but thoda bahut jitna bhi aap
Customer: jyada active reh sakte hai xy z se likhenge kyuki isme by lead kab aa rahi hai kab nahi aa rahi hai kitne baje aayegi iska koi time nahi hai.
Customer: Kyuki by lead to hum already jitne bhi competitors hai un sab logo ke comparison mein jyada hi use kar rahe hain ek ko chod ke sone wale ko wo bhi main link ka hai chain ka nahi hai chain category mein to sabse jyada hum use kar rahe hain but ha kuch companies pe jinke pass direct buyer direct inquiry jyada ja rahi hongi ho sakta hai waha unke conversion jyada ho rahe ho kyuki by lead mein fir bhi char panch log to by lead consume karenge to uske pass quotation jayega hi char panch logo ka but jinke pass direct buyer samne se call karke baat kar raha hai wo ho sakta hai shayad wahi finalize ya close sale ho.
Customer: Kyuki sara data sab kuch check kiya abhi hum logo ne to mujhe to nahi lagta ki by lead mein hamare account mein koi aisa issue hai.
Customer: Baki still main aap isko dekho hafte bhar baad ek bar main reminder set karke dobara connect kar lunga aapko kuch improvement ya same hoga jaisa hoga mere ko ek bar wapis se feedback dena dekhte hain agar isme aur kuch improve kar payenge kaise kar sakte hain.
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: Theek hai.
Customer: Okay baki wo iska meeting wagera ka jo bhi hua iska ek bar wo feedback mil jayega wo ek bar aap please se use kar lijiyega.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Thank you sir.
Executive: Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants improvement in buyleads.

- No fixed time for buyleads to come.

- Direct buyer inquiries may have better conversion.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to look into the issue.

- Executive will connect again after a week.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to provide feedback after meeting.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, improvement, direct buyer, feedback
